sentence.Network_en: He's been a keen supporter of the Labour Party all his life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一生都是工党的热情拥护者。

sentence.Network_en: He's a staunch supporter of controls on government spending.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坚决支持控制政府开支。

sentence.Network_en: He has been a Derby County supporter since boyhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从孩提时代起就是德比郡队的支持者。

means.word_mean: 同盟者,同志,伙伴,合伙人,同谋,从犯
拥护者,支持者,代表人,追随者,献身者,鼓励者

entry.def: Supporters are people who support someone or something, for example a political leader or a sports team.

example.ex: The fourth night of violence in the German city of Rostock was triggered by football supporters...
example.tran: 发生在德国城市罗斯托克的第四起夜间暴乱是由足球球迷们挑起的。

example.ex: Bradley was a major supporter of the 1986 tax reform plan.
example.tran: 布拉德利是 1986 年税收改革计划的主要支持者。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who backs a politician or a team etc.;

sentences.sentence: "all their supporters came out for the game"

means.word_mean: 2. someone who supports or champions something
3. a person who contributes to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "they hired additional help to finish the work"

means.word_mean: 4. a band (usually elastic) worn around the leg to hold up a stocking (or around the arm to hold up a sleeve)
5. a support for the genitals worn by men engaging in strenuous exercise

auth_sentence.content: I've always been a staunch supporter - always.

auth_sentence.res_content: You will now be a supporter of mass murderers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You will now be a supporter of mass murderers.

auth_sentence.content: He is a supporter of President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is a supporter of President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is a supporter of President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨
stems_affixes.word_buile: mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官
condense凝结+er……人或物品,机器→n.冷凝器,电容器
design设计+er……人或物品,机器→n.阴谋家,设计家,制图师
employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 解释程序,解释者,口译人员,翻译员,讲解员,注释器

labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者
lead领导+er人→n.领袖,领导人;首领
light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员
manufacture制造,加工+er人→manufacturer
observe观察+er……人或物品,机器→n.观测者,观察员,遵守者

print版,印刷+er……人或物品,机器→n.印刷工,打印机
prison监狱+er人→n.战俘

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产者,制作者;演出人;制片人
stems_affixes.word_buile: produce生产+er人→producer

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒
stems_affixes.word_buile: receive收到+er……人或物品,机器→n.接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒

stems_affixes.word_buile: southern南的+er人→n.南方人,居住在南方的人
strange陌生的+er……人或物品,机器→stranger陌生人

Sentence.sentence: She was known as a supporter of fake science.
But Bowman's supporters argue that Monsanto is trying to expand the scope of patents in ways that would enrich big corporations and hurt small farmers.
What is the argument of Monsanto and its supporters

sentences.en: All his supporters were expelled,exiled,or liquidated.
sentences.cn: 他的支持者全都被驱逐、流放或消灭了。

sentences.en: A lot of supporters were decked out in the team’s colours.
sentences.cn: 很多支持者穿着和这个队的队服颜色一样的衣服。

sentences.en: A hard core of supporters, mostly teenage girls, gathered at the airport to see the star arrive.
sentences.cn: 支持者的中坚分子大多是十几岁的女孩子，聚集在机场一睹这位明星的到来。
